channel.title: Cloud on Deeproot
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on Deeproot

item.title: How Modern Web Applications Are Built in 2025
item.description: Modern web applications focus on performance, maintainability, and scalability. The technology ecosystem changes rapidly, but the core principles remain consistent: build fast, secure, and user-friendly systems.

item.title: Deploying Applications to the Cloud in 2025
item.description: Cloud deployment has evolved into an automated, predictable process. With containerization and CI/CD pipelines, teams can deliver updates faster than ever.
